Motherjane

Live in Concert at NIT, Calicut on Oct 22nd, 2011.

 It's time to rock and roll...

From the band which gave us 'Insane Biography' and 'Maktub', comes an electrifying show...
Formed in Kochi in the year 1996, Motherjane is today the voice of Suraj Mani accompanied by John Thomas on drums, Clyde Rozario on bass, Deepu Sasidharan and Santosh Chandran on the guitars.
Ranked No.1 in Rock Street Journal's Bands of the Decade in 2010, their music is an eclectic blend of progressive rock with influences of Carnatic music. Capturing the imagination of youth across the country, they are now ready for NIT Calicut. Get ready to get your mind blown. Catch Motherjane Live in Concert at Tathva '11...
